Description: Classic pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil.
A crowd favorite with zesty pepperoni and mozzarella cheese.
Fresh-baked knots brushed with garlic butter and herbs.
Juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, and house sauce.
Crispy fries topped with cheese, bacon, and ranch drizzle.
Warm apple filling wrapped in flaky crust and served with vanilla ice cream.
Assorted nigiri and rolls served with wasabi and soy sauce.
Traditional Japanese soup with tofu, seaweed, and scallions.
Sweet rice cakes filled with matcha ice cream.
Grilled zucchini, peppers, and hummus wrapped in soft flatbread.
Sourdough toast topped with smashed avocado and cherry tomatoes.
Tangy lemon custard in a buttery crust, topped with whipped cream.
Pasta tossed with pancetta, egg, and Parmesan cheese.
Toasted bread topped with tomato, basil, and olive oil.
Classic Italian dessert with espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
